ProductInfo.Features:
Dual SIM Card(one Micro SIM card) Dual Standby, both of the two SIM card slots can support GSM and WCDMA
Support 2G network: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz & Support 3G network: WCDMA 850/2100MHz
5.0 inch large 5-point-touch Original SHARP SLCD capacitive screen with 1920 x 1080 pixels FHD screen resolution
13.0MP High definition back camera with Auto Focus and flashlight, Front 8.0MP camera, make your selfies more distinctive
E-compass, and supports Android Navigation, built-in GPS navigation with A-GPS assisted, makes the positioning swiftly and accurately
ProductInfo.Name: Newest Style Zopo 5.0 Inch Unlocked Dual Sim Phone with Quad-Core 1.5GHz Processor Android 4.2 2G RAM 32G ROM 13.0MP Camera
